member.name: T:Omnifactotum.Wpf.WpfFactotum
member.summary: Provides helper methods for use in WPF projects.

member.name: M:Omnifactotum.Wpf.WpfFactotum.IsInDesignMode
member.summary: Determines whether the code is running in the context of a designer.
member.returns: true if the code is running in the context of a designer; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Omnifactotum.Wpf.WpfFactotum.For`1
member.summary: Provides a convenient access to helper methods for the specified type.
member.typeparam: The type that the helper methods are provided for.

member.summary: Registers a dependency property using the specified property expression defining the property information and using the specified property metadata and the value validation callback for the property.
member.param: The property getter expression in the following form: obj => obj.Property.
The property metadata for the dependency property, or null if not specified.
The validate value callback, or null if not specified.
member.returns: A dependency property identifier used to reference the dependency property later for operations such as setting its value programmatically or obtaining metadata.
